name: Samsung switch event codes
info:
## Samsung switch events

### Which button
 - 1xxx: On
 - 2xxx: Brighter
 - 3xxx: Darker
 - 4xxx: Off

### Which event
 - xxx0: Button down-press
 - xxx1: Periodic hold report (1 per sec)
 - xxx2: Button up-release (not held)
 - xxx3: Button up-release (after held)

What do you want to be the trigger
Copy these response portions as many times as needed, for as many automations that you want
Change what happens for each response based on what you want to happen (call service, for example)
Just add the specific EVENT_ID here that matches what is in the "Ask" node then pipe it out to its corrisponding "Responses" node
In the "Ask" node it gives directions on how to fill it out
Place the unique Person IDs here
A blank Person ID will allow a response from anyone
Debug node is only needed to get the exact Person ID
Once IDs are obtained for each person this node can be deleted

name: Give directions from upstairs
data: {"target":["{{ payload }}"],"message":"Go downstairs and take a right at the bottom.  It is the last door on the right, past the bathroom.","data":{"type":"announce","method":"all"}}

name: Give directions from downstairs
data: {"target":["{{ payload }}"],"message":"Walk from the living room down the hallway.  It is the last door on the right, past the bathroom.","data":{"type":"announce","method":"all"}}

name: Report unknown location
data: {"target":["{{ payload }}"],"message":"Sorry, I do not know where you are, but I hope you find your beer, and yourself.","data":{"type":"announce","method":"all"}}
